FlowNode.ExtendedProperty:
ZoneType=0;ScriptContent=if 'call_map' not in _gd_: _gd_['call_map'] = {} # chan => call_info
if 'call_map_r' not in _gd_: _gd_['call_map_r'] = {} # res_id => call_info
if 'conf_map' not in _gd_: _gd_['conf_map'] = {} # conf_id -> conf_info
if 'conf_map_r' not in _gd_: _gd_['conf_map_r'] = {} # res_id -> conf_info
if 'codecs' not in _gd_: _gd_['codecs'] = [ 'G711_ALAW_20MS': 0x00, 'G711_ULAW_20MS': 0x01, 'G726_16_20MS': 0x02, 'G726_24_20MS': 0x03, 'G726_32_20MS': 0x04, 'G726_40_20MS': 0x05, 'G727_16_20MS': 0x06, 'G727_24_16_20MS': 0x07, 'G727_24_20MS': 0x08, 'G727_32_16_20MS': 0x09, 'G727_32_24_20MS': 0x0a, 'G727_32_20MS': 0x0b, 'G727_40_16_20MS': 0x0c, 'G727_40_24_20MS': 0x0d, 'G727_40_32_20MS': 0x0e, 'G723_5_3_30MS': 0x0f, 'G723_6_3_30MS': 0x10, 'G729_20MS': 0x11, 'G711_ALAW_30MS': 0x12, 'iLBC_20MS': 0x13, 'iLBC_30MS': 0x14, 'CLEAR_CHANNEL': 0x15, 'GSM_FR': 0x16, 'GSM_EFR': 0x17, 'AMR_475_OA': 0x18, 'AMR_515_OA': 0x19, 'AMR_590_OA': 0x1a, 'AMR_670_OA': 0x1b, 'AMR_740_OA': 0x1c, 'AMR_795_OA': 0x1d, 'AMR_102_OA': 0x1e, 'AMR_122_OA': 0x1f, 'AMR_475_BE': 0x20, 'AMR_515_BE': 0x21, 'AMR_590_BE': 0x22, 'AMR_670_BE': 0x23, 'AMR_740_BE': 0x24, 'AMR_795_BE': 0x25, 'AMR_102_BE': 0x26, 'AMR_122_BE': 0x27, 'AMR_WB_66_BE': 0x28, 'AMR_WB_885_BE': 0x29, 'AMR_WB_1265_BE': 0x2A, 'AMR_WB_1425_BE': 0x2B, 'AMR_WB_1585_BE': 0x2C, 'AMR_WB_1825_BE': 0x2D, 'AMR_WB_1985_BE': 0x2E, 'AMR_WB_2305_BE': 0x2F, 'AMR_WB_2385_BE': 0x30, 'AMR_WB_66_OA': 0x31, 'AMR_WB_885_OA': 0x32, 'AMR_WB_1265_OA': 0x33, 'AMR_WB_1425_OA': 0x34, 'AMR_WB_1585_OA': 0x35, 'AMR_WB_1825_OA': 0x36, 'AMR_WB_1985_OA': 0x37, 'AMR_WB_2305_OA': 0x38, 'AMR_WB_2385_OA': 0x39, 'SILK_8KSS_20MS': 0x3A, 'SILK_16KSS_20MS': 0x3B, 'OPUS_8KSS_20MS': 0x3C, 'OPUS_16KSS_20MS': 0x3D, ]

ZoneType=0;ScriptContent=ini_file = '/home/hesong/ipsc/config/{}/SipReg.ini'.format(GetIpscID()) Trace('SipReg fil=%s' % ini_file) for i in range(255): Trace('SipReg [%d]' % i) section = str(i) username = IniGetString(section, 'username', None, ini_file) if username is None: Trace('SipReg [%d]: username is None' % i) break username=username.strip() displayname = IniGetString(section, 'displayname', username, ini_file).strip() psw = IniGetString(section, 'psw', None, ini_file) if psw is None: Trace('SipReg [%d]: psw is None' % i) TraceErr('No psw field in sip account %d' % i) continue authorusername = IniGetString(section, 'authorusername', '', ini_file).strip() if not authorusername: authorusername = username domain = IniGetString(section, 'domain', None, ini_file).strip() if domain is None: TraceErr('No domain field in sip account %d' % i) continue proxyip = IniGetString(section, 'proxyip', "", ini_file).strip() port = IniGetInt(section, 'port', 5060, ini_file) expires = IniGetInt(section, 'expires', 3600, ini_file) Trace('SipRegister(displayname=%s, username=%s, psw=%s, authorusername=%s, domain=%s, port=%s, proxyip=%s, expires=%s)' % (displayname, username, psw, authorusername, domain, port, proxyip, expires)) sipregidx = SipRegister(displayname, username, psw, authorusername, domain, port, proxyip, expires) if sipregidx >= 0: Trace('SipRegister => %s' % sipregidx) else: TraceErr('SipRegister => %s' % sipregidx)
